caption.p: Effect of acyclovir 1 μg/mL (HSV-1) or 2 μg/mL (HSV-2) alone or in combination with varying omeprazole (OME) concentrations (μg/mL) on HSV-1 and HSV-2 titres in HaCaT cells. Numerical values are presented in Supplementary Table S3. ∗ P < 0.05 relative to acyclovir alone, # P < 0.05 relative to untreated virus control; N.D. = no detectable virus titre.
